channel.title: New rules to ads section
channel.description:
1. No layout is required, but be sure to include all relevant information needed to play on your server 2. Post topics for your own server, nobody else's 3. If you want to advertise a website for your forum, do it inside your topic 4. Think before you post - if it's irrelevant, then don't post 5. No Hamachi 6. Don't ask about server status - This means asking whether the server is up or not
In rule 5, does the mean were are not allowed hamachi servers? :|

item.title: New rules to ads section
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

not at all lol, btw hamachi is the host…not the server :P, i think it means you dont have to put whether it has hamachi if you don’t,just as long as the required information is there for the server.

Read full topic
